name: Void Constructor
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
languages: understands Void Speech but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 13 (4d4+3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends the constructor can't use its tentacles on another target.

special_abilities.name: Mobile Grappler
special_abilities.desc: While grappling a creature the constructor can move at its full speed carrying the grappled creature along with it.

special_abilities.name: Tainted Aura
special_abilities.desc: A Void constructor that has completed a Void henge gains necrotic energy while within 1 mile of the henge. At the start of each of the Void constructor's turns each creature within 10 ft. of it must make DC 13 Cha save or take 2 (1d4) necrotic. The Void constructor can choose for a creature it is grappling to be immune to the Tainted Auras of all Void constructors.
